metadata.name: Mindful Metaverse Portal
metadata.description: On May 5th, 2022, a coalition of mindfulness organizations released the 'Manifesto for Mindfulness in web3'. With it, thousands of people pledged to actualize their personal mindfulness journey. Signatories of the manifesto were subsequently invited to mint a limited edition NFT to recognize their participation in the founding of the Mindful Metaverse. The NFT serves as portal to the Mindful Metaverse including access to allowlists, events, and IRL experiences.
